about.name: Andrii Deisan
about.summary: I am an experienced front-end developer with a strong command of JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS. I guide projects from conception to deployment and am committed to taking ownership of my work. I embrace feedback and adapt seamlessly to dynamic business environments while maintaining peak productivity. Looking forward, I am excited to deepen my expertise in frontend development, stay updated on emerging technologies, and refine my skills in advanced frameworks and UI/UX design. I also aspire to broaden my knowledge in backend development, cloud computing, and DevOps practices to contribute effectively to cross-functional projects and tackle more intricate challenges in the evolving web development landscape.

work_experience.description: I lead the front-end development of client and admin modules, forming communication protocols for client-server interaction. I contributed to a large-scale, multilingual project with over 200 non-template pages, which features its own architecture with SSR. I built numerous reusable components, developed modules based on Redux and Redux Thunk, and covered projects with Jest snapshot tests. Key achievements include developing a site builder module, optimizing the build process, updating SVG image generation, enhancing PDF templates, and updating libraries. I also continuously improve site performance and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time.

I created interactive user interfaces in React and Typescript, utilizing Redux Toolkit and Effector for state management, Formik for forms, CSS Modules and Chakra UI for styling, Apollo GraphQL for server requests, and fetch/axios for REST API interactions. I adhered to the architectural methodology of Feature-Sliced Design and used Asana for task planning.

I filmed and edited video materials, wrote scripts, managed videos at various post-production stages, and used Adobe post-production tools. I ensured the quality, organization, and content governance of the channel.
I administered the site, created and edited content, optimized content using SEO, edited photos and videos, localized content, and worked with CRM systems.
I managed social media marketing, set up advertisement campaigns, and moderated and supported forums.

education.degree: Redux for the state of React apps managing
education.description: This course delves into Redux, a state management library for React applications. Topics include Redux principles, best practices, and practical projects to build scalable and maintainable React applications with Redux integration.

The course covered fundamental and advanced topics in frontend development, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React. Key areas of focus included responsive web design, version control with Git, building dynamic user interfaces, state management with Redux, and best practices for writing clean, maintainable code. The course also included hands-on projects to build real-world applications and collaborative coding exercises to enhance teamwork skills.
